name: Capitalis Major
shortDescription: A collection of four superheavy ships, each with their own missions to unlock them, all of which are only avaliable after the main story has been finished.
description:
A collection of four superheavy ships, each with their own missions to unlock them, all of which are only avaliable after the main story has been finished.
